North_Richland_Hills.Nolan Catholic High School:
Nolan Catholic High School is a private, coeducational, college preparatory school, formerly in the Marianist tradition, and is located in the Roman Catholic Diocese of Fort Worth, Texas. It serves grades 9-12, has an average student population of 1150, and serves the Church by educating and forming youth in the Roman Catholic faith through its mission.


== School profile ==
Nolan Catholic High School is a private Catholic college preparatory school in Fort Worth, Tarrant County, Texas.
